articles.description: It was, briefly, the zeitgeist’s perfect Silicon Valley story: a sex-and-drugs party hosted hosted by since-ousted top-tier VC Steve Jurvetson, at an official Draper Fisher Jurvetson event,attended by multiple billionaires including Elon Musk. So said Paul Bi…
articles.title: Everyone hates us, and it’s not because of our sex parties
articles.author: Jon Evans

articles.description: When last we checked in on the Donald Trump’s response to the opioid crisis, the news was hardly encouraging: The closest thing to someone at the helm was wildly corrupt New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie and extremely bad liar Kellyanne Conway. Read more...
articles.title: White House Made 24-Year-Old Campaign Staffer Second in Command at Its Anti-Drug Office
articles.author: Tom McKay

articles.description: "This place is a shithole." The five-word proclamation appeared as a projection above the entryway at Washington, D.C.'s Trump International Hotel on Saturday night. The projection also included an arrow pointing directly at the hotel's entrance and a crowd o…
articles.title: 'This place is a shithole' projection appears on Donald Trump's D.C. hotel
articles.author: Adam Rosenberg

articles.description: In case anyone still doubted the prescience of The Handmaid's Tale, this anecdote should clear things up. At a Television Critics Association panel on Jan 14., show creator Bruce Miller revealed that the writers foresaw Trump's MAGA campaign slogan before it …
articles.title: Sorry, Trump: 'The Handmaid’s Tale' was saying MAGA before you
articles.author: Jess Joho

articles.description: Mika Brzezinski and Joe Scarborough hate-flirting and talking over their guests on "Morning Joe" was a welcome way to return from Saturday Night Live's holiday hiatus, especially with a big reveal under the Steve Bannon Grim Reaper cloak. Mika (Kate McKinnon)…
articles.title: Bill Murray, yes, Bill Murray portrays Steve Bannon in hilarious 'SNL' cold open

articles.description: #WeGotThis In a five-word Twitter statement on Sunday, Chelsea Manning formally announced her intention to run for a Senate seat in Maryland. Manning's candidacy was the subject of much speculation on Saturday when a Federal Election Commission filing in her …
articles.title: Chelsea Manning confirmed it: She's running for Senate in 2018

articles.description: When a federal judge in California ordered a stop to a key plank of President Trump’s immigration agenda, he revived a debate over the impartiality of the judiciary.
articles.title: A DACA Question: Should Judges Use Local Cases to Halt National Orders?
articles.author: KATIE BENNER

articles.description: The former soldier will seek the Democratic Party's nomination to run in Maryland in November.
articles.title: Chelsea Manning: Ex-army leaker to run for US senate

articles.description: Sen. David Perdue (R-GA) said Trump did not call African nations "shithole countries" in a meeting on immigration, after earlier saying in a statement that he couldn't recall if Trump used those words.
articles.title: Senators' conflicting accounts of Trump remark

articles.description: Former Democratic Virginia Gov. Terry McAuliffe says that President Donald Trump is an embarrassment to the country and all Americans.
articles.title: McAuliffe: Trump is an embarrassment

articles.description: Haitian-American Rep. Mia Love (R-UT) says that President Trump's comments about Haiti and African countries made during an immigration meeting with lawmakers were racist and unfortunate.
articles.title: GOP Rep.: Trump comments racist

articles.description: In an interview with CNN's Jake Tapper, Rep. Tulsi Gabbard (D-HI) questions what President Trump is doing to eliminate the nuclear threat posed by North Korea.
articles.title: Gabbard to Trump: Talk with N. Korea

articles.description: After President Donald Trump signed off on a waiver to keep several sanctions on Iran suspended, Iranian President Hassan Rouhani mocked him for failing to kill off the Iran nuclear deal despite the US leader's election promise to do so.
articles.title: Iran: Trump failed to kill nuclear deal

articles.description: Rep. John Lewis (D-GA) called President Donald Trump a "racist," citing Trump's reported remarks about immigrants coming to the United States from "shithole countries" during a White House meeting with lawmakers on immigration reform.
articles.title: Rep. John Lewis: Trump is a racist

articles.description: Bill Murray surprised the audience on NBC's "Saturday Night Live", debuting in the show's opening sketch as former Trump White House chief strategist, Steve Bannon.
articles.title: Watch Bill Murray spoof Bannon on 'SNL'

articles.description: Former Governor Terry McAuliffe (D-VA) tells CNN's Jake Tapper that it is time for people to stand up to President Trump.
articles.title: McAuliffe: He gets away with foolishness

articles.description: Lawmakers and other politicians were at odds Sunday about whether they think Congress will be able to reach an immigration deal amid the outcry over President Donald Trump's remarks about immigrants from certain countries last week.
articles.title: How will Trump's reported comment affect push for DACA deal?
articles.author: Aileen Graef, CNN

articles.description: WASHINGTON (Reuters) - U.S. President Donald Trump said on Sunday that a program protecting young immigrants brought to the United States illegally by their parents would probably be discontinued.
articles.title: Trump says program protecting young immigrants 'probably dead'
articles.author: Reuters Editorial
